text: FreeOTFE is a free, open source, computer program used to automatically encrypt and decrypt information stored on a hard disk. FreeOTFE was originally written for Microsoft Windows and was later copied to Windows Mobile (FreeOTFE4PDA). It can encrypt information using a large number algorithms including AES (aka Rijndael), Blowfish, CAST6, MARS, RC6, Serpent and Twofish. Sarah Dean is the developer of FreeOTFE. ==Related pages== * Encryption * Pretty Good Privacy (PGP) - Email encryption * PuTTY - SSH encryption == Other websites == * Official WWW site Category:Cryptography Category:Microsoft Windows software Category:Free software Category:Secrecy Category:Computer security
title: FreeOTFE
